Title
TransRate: reference free quality assessment of de-novo transcriptome assemblies Authors
Richard Smith-Unna 1 , Chris Boursnell 1 , Rob Patro 2 , Julian M Hibberd 1 , and Steven Kelly 3*

Corresponding Author
* email: steven.kelly@plants.ox.ac.uk
, phone: 0044 (0) 1865 275123 Abstract
TransRate is a tool for reference-free quality assessment of de novo transcriptome assemblies.
Using only sequenced reads as the input, TransRate measures the quality of individual contigs
and whole assemblies, enabling assembly optimization and comparison. TransRate can
accurately evaluate assemblies of conserved and novel RNA molecules of any kind in any
species. We show that it is more accurate than comparable methods and demonstrate its use
on a variety of data.
